overview: Diliryong Itim 2: Langhap sa Dilim is another chapter that unveils the untold secrets. Many years have passed but the curse is unstoppable when Lucero returns in his evil ways to take the souls of young ones who were influenced by vices, including drugs. Darius finds out the mystery of his friend’s death and finds solution to stop Lucero’s revenge. It happens when his father returns. Would Darius accept his father once again? What would be the cause of Lucero’s return?
title: Diliryong Itim 2: Langhap sa Dilim
